title: Episode 67 w/ Duck Down
itunes:title: Episode 67 w/ Duck Down
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with Smif-n-Wessun, DJ Evil Dee, Dru Ha and the late Sean P's Wife, Bernadette Price. They talk the start of Duck Down, how Smif-n-Wessun came to be, Black Moon, Boot Camp Clik, Sean P's life, Brooklyn, Biggie and more. BuckShot calls in and Capone joins us in time to celebrate his Birthday! --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
